metadata.title: CVE-2014-7837 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: mod/wiki/admin.php in Moodle through 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.9, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.6, and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 allows remote authenticated users toremove wiki pages by leveraging delete access within a different subwiki.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
